item.title: FDA Okays Ketamine-Based Med for Post-Surgical Pain
item.description: The FDA has approved the racemic ketamine product KETARx for the management of pain after surgery. Medscape Medical News

item.title: Coronary Sinus Reducer Shows Promise, With Caveats
item.description: In sham-controlled trials, the device appears less beneficial than it has been in single-arm, observational studies. Medscape Medical News

item.title: NHS to Hire Nurses Before Vacancies Exist
item.description: A government pledge to unlock more posts for nursing and midwifery graduates in England has been welcomed, despite concerns over funding. Medscape New...

item.title: Paclitaxel Balloon Improves Complex Stent Care

item.title: Patients With GI Issues? Natural Remedies May Give Relief
